title: Bug 121687: Exception throws when export data in table which inside a grid cell.
description: When attempting to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown. This issue occurs in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() function.
OB: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell.
EB: When exporting data, the system should successfully export the data from the tables without any exceptions being thrown.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Insert a grid. 2. Attempt to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell.
